name: Slash Ninja FREE
description:
"Slash Ninja FREE" is easy to play, fun and very cool.

Touch the screen whit your finger to slash and
break everything, like a true Ninja Warrior!
Be careful of the dynamite which is explosive
to touch and will put a swift end your adventure.

Key Features:

Smooth Feeling Game Play
Pick Up And Play
Cool Audio Effects
Fantastic Graphic Effects
Very Easy To Play
Play As More You Can
Endless Game Play
